overview: Produced in collaboration with Stink Studios, "Duct Tape and Dreams" captures the essence of SFMOMA’s first artist Soapbox Derby in more than forty years: the creativity, collaboration, and exuberance of everyone who participated — and, of course, all that exciting downhill action!  Year: 2022  Running time: 27 minutes  Producers: SFMOMA and Stink Studios  Directors: Ian Watt and RJ Kosineski  Director of Photography: Jan Reichle  Editor: Ian Watt
tagline: Reviving the Soapbox Derby at McLaren Park
title: Duct Tape and Dreams
